data.message: I still can't get this to work for me

replies.message: Hi Susan. If you're experiencing this issue on your mobile device, please try updating the app. If you're experiencing this on your desktop, you can report it to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1RDZMsA. Thanks. -Azaria
I don't know how to update the apps. I will ask one of my kids, thank you for getting back to me!
My app is updated on my iPhone 6s and still won't work. I've tried rebooting, deleting and reinstalling, and restarting my phone.
Same- iPhone 6 not able to use
Have you tried holding your finger on the like button?

Susan Martin Lobecker if you have an iPhone, go to the App Store app on your phone. It's a blue icon with an A like symbol. It should say App Store below it. When you tap on it and it open, on the bottom right hand side there will be a square with a downwards arrow. Click on that. Then it will show you all the apps that need to be updated. Then you click on the button that says update. I hope this helps!
It also doesn't work on comments! IT ONLY WORKS ON POSTS.
For example, if you tried to hold like on this comment, it will just like it. It won't show you the other emotions.
I hope this helps! Let me know if you're still having trouble!
I've tried everything too but it doesn't work on iPhone 6...

Mindy Poulton  it works on my IPhone 6. Did you go to setting on your phone, go to general, then look for software update, click on it and it will tell you if there is an update available. If there is one click to update. If not, I'd go by a cell phone store and get a tech to help. Or the geek squad at Best Buy would probably help you. Hope this helps. 😊
I'm all up to date on my 6S and don't have them.  I don't have them on my PC either (and I know how to use them hubby and daughter have them).
Heather Briney i dont have them either and dont have "on this day" feature as well. Dont know what to do
I have on this day but still no reactions.  I'm beyond frustrated.
I have reported several times but they dont respond.
